trans-unit.source: Defines constants for supported well-known authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: Definisce costanti per i metodi di autenticazione noti supportati.

trans-unit.source: Defines constants for SAML authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: Definisce costanti per i metodi di autenticazione SAML.

trans-unit.source: These constants define URIs for well-known authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: Queste costanti definiscono gli URI per i metodi di autenticazione nota.

trans-unit.source: These authentication methods map to well-known SAML authentication methods.
trans-unit.target: Eseguire il mapping di questi metodi di autenticazione noto metodi di autenticazione SAML.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using a hardware token, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/hardwaretoken.
Authentication by using the Kerberos protocol, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/kerberos.
The namespace for the well-known authentication methods, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/.
trans-unit.target: Spazio dei nomi per i metodi di autenticazione noti, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using a key authenticated by a PGP web of trust, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/pgp.
trans-unit.target: Autenticazione mediante una chiave autenticata da un Web of trust PGP, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/pgp.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using the Secure Remote Password protocol, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/secureremotepassword.
trans-unit.target: Autenticazione mediante il protocollo Secure Remote Password, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/secureremotepassword.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using an XML digital signature, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/signature.
trans-unit.target: Autenticazione mediante una firma digitale XML, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/signature.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using a smartcard PKI, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/smartcardpki.
Authentication on a key authenticated using an SPKI PKI, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/spki.
trans-unit.target: Autenticazione con una chiave autenticata su una PKI SPKI, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/spki.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using either the SSL or TLS protocol with certificate-based client authentication, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/tlsclient.
trans-unit.target: Autenticazione mediante il protocollo SSL o TLS con l'autenticazione client basata su certificato, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/tlsclient.

trans-unit.source: Authentication by using an unspecified method, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/unspecified.
trans-unit.target: Autenticazione mediante un metodo non specificato, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/unspecified.

trans-unit.source: Authentication on a key authenticated using an X.509 PKI, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/x509.
trans-unit.target: Autenticazione mediante una chiave autenticata tramite PKI X.509, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/x509.

trans-unit.source: Authentication on a key authenticated using an XKMS trust service, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/xkms.
trans-unit.target: Autenticazione mediante una chiave autenticata tramite un servizio trust XKMS, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/authenticationmethod/xkms.
